link-text: Academic Men Explain Things to Me: There Must be SOME Reason You're Here
link-description:
mansplained:

Iâm an English professor. A few years ago, I went to a small conference in my subfield, which also happens to be a field in which my mother sometimes works.

The first night of the conference, the organizers hosted a dinner for presenters. No one else was invited. Everyone had a nametag, listing…

What a relief! Also: urgh.
